subject: Re: Order #SSN2821 confirmed
description_text:
I received the product but it appears I have the wrong control box for it
to work with my existing pedals. I have the smaller pedal connectors that
was included. I'm assuming I need the other variant of the control box

Please see attached photos.

Ryan C. Catalano
Pennsylvania State University Alumni
Ryancatalano88@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi R Catalano,  Hello, you currently purchased the ProX Ultra control box. If needed, you can also purchase a PlusX main control box. However, you can actually use the ProX Ultra control box alone to handle telemetry vibration feedback via SimHub or SIMSONN Manager, without connecting the pedal signal. In other words, your original control box can remain responsible for the pedal inputs, while the new control box handles only the telemetry vibrations. Please try this setup first to check for any conflicts. If it still doesn’t work properly, you may need to purchase a PlusX main control box.

I tried using both control boxes and it gets confused and doesn't work. It
either doesn't recognize the pedals and the haptics works. Or the pedals
work and the haptics don not. I will order the correct control box and
return the plus x one. Thanks

Ryan C. Catalano
Pennsylvania State University Alumni
Ryancatalano88@gmail.com

On Fri, Oct 17, 2025, 10:22 PM service@simsonn.com

Please issue a return for the SSN2821 order for the control box please

Ryan C. Catalano
Pennsylvania State University Alumni
Ryancatalano88@gmail.com
